com.trident.android.tv.si.provider.epg
Class EPGProvider

java.lang.Object
  ContentProvider
      com.trident.android.tv.si.provider.epg.EPGProvider

public class EPGProvider
extends ContentProvider

EPGProvider is the provider of EPG data within the TV system.

Author:
Pierr Chen

Field Detail

PROVIDER_NAME

public static final java.lang.String PROVIDER_NAME
See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONTENT_URI_EVENTS

public static final Uri CONTENT_URI_EVENTS
Normal query. The projections, selections and selectionArgs are limited to : Following Values.

  • Events.SECTION_GUID
  • Events.TSID
  • Events.ONID
  • Events.SERVICE_ID
  • Events.START_TIME
  • Events.DURATION
  • Events.RUNNING_STATUS
  • Events.CA_MODE
  • Events.NAME
  • Events.SHORT_DESCRIPTION
  • Events.level1 *
  • Events.level2

See Also:
EventsContract.Events

CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_SEARCH

public static final Uri CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_SEARCH
Query the events by keywords.

1. We will search following columns in respectively table, Events.NAME , Events.SHORT_DESCRITPION and Events.item

2. It is important to note that CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_SEARCH the projects are limited to :

  • Events.SECTION_GUID
  • Events.TSID
  • Events.ONID
  • Events.SERVICE_ID
  • Events.START_TIME
  • Events.DURATION
  • Events.RUNNING_STATUS
  • Events.CA_MODE
  • Events.NAME
  • Events.SHORT_DESCRIPTION
To get the projections Events.item, Events.item_descriptions the user should issue another query using CONTENT_URI_QUERY_EXTENED

CONTENT_URI_QUERY_EXTENED

public static final Uri CONTENT_URI_QUERY_EXTENED
Query extended events by eguid. Will return following attributes associated with this event specified by the eguid.

Events.item, Events.item_descriptions

user case : get the basic event, use the id of that events to get the extended descriptors.

CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_MOVIE

public static final Uri CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_MOVIE
Query all the movie events. The projections can be used are some as that when using CONTENT_URI_EVENTS.

CONTENT_URI_EVENTS_NEWS
